DataElement.preferredName: HHIE-S Hearing Problem Causes Embarrassment When Meeting New People Score 3 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation indicating whether their hearing problem causes them to feel embarrased when meeting new people, using a three-point scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Hearing Handicap Inventory for the Elderly Screening Version Hearing Problem Causes Embarrassment When Meeting New People Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 10-item questionnaire developed to assess how an individual perceives the social and emotional effects of hearing loss. It is designed to be administered face-to-face but can be given as a paper, self-reported instrument._A question about whether an individual's hearing problem causes them embarrassment when meeting new people._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Hearing Handicap Inventory for the Elderly Screening Version NCI Def: A 10-item questionnaire developed to assess how an individual perceives the social and emotional effects of hearing loss. It is designed to be administered face-to-face but can be given as a paper, self-reported instrument.

Concepts.longName: Hearing Handicap Inventory for the Elderly, Screening Version
Concepts.definition: A 10-item questionnaire developed to assess how an individual perceives the social and emotional effects of hearing loss. It is designed to be administered face-to-face but can be given as a paper, self-reported instrument.
